com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices

Class MobileServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.mobileservices.MobileServiceClient

  • public class MobileServiceClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry-point for Microsoft Azure Mobile Services interactions

                          java.util.List<<any>> parameters,
                          java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                          ApiOperationCallback<E> callback)
        Deprecated. use invokeApi(String apiName, Object body, String httpMethod, List> parameters, final Class clazz) instead
        Invokes a custom API
        Parameters:
        apiName - The API name
        body - The object to send as the request body
        httpMethod - The HTTP Method used to invoke the API
        parameters - The query string parameters sent in the request
        clazz - The API result class
        callback - The callback to invoke after the API execution
